alert.note: Alert for Socorro; Valencia (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 3:46PM MDT until June 09 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Valencia County in central New Mexico... North central Socorro County in central New Mexico... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 346 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Bernardo, or 15 miles southwest of Belen, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Belen, Jarales, Los Trujillos-Gabaldon, Casa Colorada, Veguita, Las Nutrias, Sabinal, Abeytas, Rio Communities and Los Chaves. This includes Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 177 and 195. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
